Query: How do i select all text in Vi/Vim?

Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Print a text message. Note: quotes are optional
Answers.Most Similar NL2Bash Task: Find and remove multiple files such as *.mp3 or *.txt under current directory

find.mpsum: search for files in a directory hierarchy
find.-name:
This option is supported, but POSIX conformance depends on the POSIX conformance of
 the system's fnmatch(3) library function. As of findutils-4.2.2, shell
 metacharacters (`*', `?' or `[]' for example) will match a leading `.', because
 IEEE PASC interpretation 126 requires this. This is a change from previous
 versions of findutils.

rm.-f: ignore nonexistent files and arguments, never prompt

Top-3 Similar Questions: so_31704992: Regex to select text after second occurance of special character
Top-3 Scripts:
so_31704992: $ while read line; do line=${line%%Match[Ffile]*}; line=${line##*_}; echo $line; done < filename
